basic.description: This course is suitable for students who are ready to learn more complex phrasing and transitioning of basic ballet movement. Includes some theoretical study of the history of the art form and comprehension of the vocabulary of ballet technical terms. May be repeated to a maximum of nine semester hours.
basic.subject: DAA
basic.title: Beginning Ballet III-Nonmajors

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Faculty placement or instructor permission.
